com.github.princesslana.eriscasper.api.robot

Class RobotContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.princesslana.eriscasper.api.robot.RobotContext

  • public class RobotContext
extends java.lang.Object
    RobotContext is provided to callbacks setup in Robot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RobotContext(BotContext bctx, java.util.regex.Matcher matcher, Message message)
      Creates a RobotContext based upon the provided parameters.

      Whether the received message was matched by the matcher.
      Completable reply(java.lang.String msg)
      Sends a reply to the message triggering the callback.

        public RobotContext(BotContext bctx,
                    java.util.regex.Matcher matcher,

        Creates a RobotContext based upon the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        bctx - the core BotContext
        matcher - matcher used by the regex on the message
        message - the message that was received

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        public boolean matches()
        Whether the received message was matched by the matcher.

      • match

        public java.lang.String match(int group)
        Gets the value captured by the indexed group as matched in the message.
        Parameters:
        group - index of the capturing group
        Returns:
        the value captured by the group

      • match

        public java.lang.String match(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the value captured by the named group as matched in the message.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the capturing group
        Returns:
        the value captured by the group

      • reply

        public Completable reply(java.lang.String msg)
        Sends a reply to the message triggering the callback. The user that sent the message will be pinged.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send

      • send

        public Completable send(java.lang.String msg)
        Sends a message to the room of the message the triggered the callback.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send
